page.title: 08Methodist Church Plym.St.M.
page.content: This small church stands at the junction of two minor roads close to a small group of houses.At present it has a{membership of five}who attend regularly.There is{no Sunday School attached probably due to families having grown up and there not being many young children in the immediate vicinity. A{graveyard}is beside the church which is unusual in the Methodists. The minister in charge is also responsible for the Plympton Methodist Church. On special occasions, e.g. Harvest, Church Anniversary etc., members of other churches attend swelling the size of the congregation.
